column2: de ltar na las des lus dang ngag gi nyes pa rnams pas yid kyi nyes pa ches kha na ma tho ba chen po dang bcas par 'grub par ji ltar 'gyur te /

column1: tad manaH pradoza mAtreNa tAvatAm sattvAnAm maraNAt siDyati
column2: de'i yid 'khrugs pa tsam gyis sems can de snyed 'chi bar 'grub bo //

column1: yadi vijQaptimAtram eva idam para citta vidaH kim para cittam jAnanti aTa na
column2: gal te 'di dag rnam par rig pa tsam du zad na gzhan gyi sems rig pas ci gzhan gyi sems shes sam 'on te mi shes she na /

column1: kim ca atas
column2: 'dis ci zhig bya /

column1: yadi na jAnanti kaTam para citta vidaH Bavanti
column2: gal te mi shes na ni gzhan gyi sems rig pa zhes kyang ci skad du bya /

column1: aTa jAnanti
column2: ji ste shes na yang /

column1: para citta vidAm jQAnam ayaTArTam kaTam yaTA
column2: gzhan sems rig pas shes ba ni // don bzhin ma yin ji ltar dper //

column1: sva citta jQAnam
column2: rang sems shes pa /

column1: tat api kaTam ayaTArTa
column2: de yang ji ltar don ji lta ba bzhin du ma yin zhe na /

column1: ajQAnAt yaTA budDasya gocaraH yaTA tad niraBilApyena AtmanA budDAnAm gocaraH
column2: sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul ji bzhin ma shes phyir /

column1: taTA tad ajQAnAt tat uBayam na yaTArTam vitaTa pratiBAsa tayA grAhya grAhaka vikalpasya aprahINa tvAt
column2: ji ltar de brjod du med pa'i bdag nyid du sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul du gyur pa de ltar des ma shes pa'i phyir de gnyi ga yang don ji lta ba bzhin ma yin te / log par snang ba'i phyir ro // gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa ma spangs pa'i phyir ro //

column1: ananta viniScaya praBeda AgAmBIryAyAm vijQaptimAtra tAyAm
column2: rnam par rig pa tsam gyis rab tu dbye ba rnam par nges pa mtha' yas la gting mi dpogs shing zab ba'i /

column1: vijQapti mAtra tA sidDiH sva Sakti sadRSI mayA
column2: rnam rig tsam du grub pa 'di // bdag gis bdag gi mthu 'dra bar // byas kyi de yi rnam pa kun //

column1: kRtA iyam sarvaTA sA tu na cintyA
column2: bsam yas /

column1: sarva prakArA tu sA mAdRSEH cintayitum na Sakyate
column2: bdag 'dra bas rnam pa thams cad ni bsam par mi nus te /

column1: tarka avizaya tvAt
column2: rtog ge'i spyod yul ma yin pa'i @10a * // phyir ro //

column1: kasya punar sA sarvaTA gocaraH iti Aha
column2: 'o na de rnam pa thams cad du su'i spyod yul snyam pa la /

column1: budDa gocaraH
column2: sangs rgyas spyod yul lo zhes bya ba smos te /

column1: budDAnAm hi sA BagavatAm sarva prakAram gocaraH sarva AkAra sarva jQeya jQAna aviGAtAt iti viMSatikA vijQapti mAtra tA sidDiH
column2: de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi spyod yul te / shes bya thams cad kyi rnam pa thams cad la mkhyen pa thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i phyir ro //
slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa nyi shu ba'i 'grel pa rdzogs so /
